mapper.select: SELECT t.*,p1.name as thirdPartyName FROM t_project_lab t left join t_third_party p1 on t.third_party_id = p1.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.*,p1.name as thirdPartyName,c.customer_name as customerName FROM t_project_lab t left join t_third_party p1 on t.third_party_id = p1.id left join t_project p on t.project_id = p.id left join t_customer c on p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.progress_code = #{progressCode}

SELECT l.*, p.project_no, p.project_type, p.category, p.customer_id, p.source_type, p.source_id, p3.name AS thirdPartyName, c.customer_name AS customerName, CASE WHEN p.source_type = 1 THEN p2.name WHEN p.source_type = 2 THEN e.actual_name ELSE NULL END AS sourceName, DATEDIFF(l.lab_expected_date, CURDATE()) AS alarmDays FROM t_project_lab l LEFT JOIN t_project p ON l.project_id = p.id and p.deleted_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_third_party p3 ON l.third_party_id = p3.id LEFT JOIN t_customer c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_third_party p2 ON p.source_type = 1 AND p.source_id = p2.id LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON p.source_type = 2 AND p.source_id = e.employee_id WHERE p.project_type IN (11, 12, 21) AND l.third_party_id = #{queryForm.thirdPartyId} AND INSTR(p.project_no, #{queryForm.projectNo}) AND p.project_type = #{queryForm.projectType} AND p.category = #{queryForm.category} AND p.customer_id = #{queryForm.customerId} AND p.source_type = #{queryForm.sourceType} AND p.source_id = #{queryForm.sourceId}
AND l.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT n.task_id FROM t_project_node n WHERE operate_user_id = #{queryForm.operateUserId})
AND l.status = #{queryForm.status} AND INSTR(l.lab_contract_no, #{queryForm.labContractNo}) AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{queryForm.labPayDateBegin} AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{queryForm.labPayDateEnd}
AND l.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT n.task_id FROM t_project_product n WHERE 1=1
AND INSTR(n.product_name, #{queryForm.productName})
AND INSTR(n.product_model, #{queryForm.productModel})
)
AND l.id in ( select distinct task_id from t_project_node where project_type in (11,12,21) and node_id in (3,4,5,6,7) and status in (0,1) )
AND l.id in ( select distinct n.task_id from t_project_node n inner join ( select distinct project_id, task_id from t_project_node where project_type in (11,12,21) and node_id = 7 and status = 2) as n1 on n1.project_id = n.project_id and n1.task_id = n.task_id where n.node_id in (8,9,10) and n.status in (0,1) )
AND l.lab_expected_date IS NOT NULL AND l.lab_expected_date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND l.status != 2 ORDER BY alarmDays ASC, l.create_time DESC
order by l.create_time desc

SELECT l.*, p.project_no, p.project_type, p.category, p.customer_id, p.source_type, p.source_id, p.audit_date, p3.name AS thirdPartyName, c.customer_name AS customerName, n.lab_report_date AS labReportDate, n.self_declaration_date AS selfDeclareDate, n.certificate_send_date AS certificateSendDate,n.mailing_date AS mailingDate, CASE WHEN p.source_type = 1 THEN p2.name WHEN p.source_type = 2 THEN e.actual_name ELSE NULL END AS sourceName, CASE WHEN p.project_type = 11 THEN 'CCC自我声明' WHEN p.project_type = 12 THEN '产品认证' WHEN p.project_type = 21 THEN '试验项目' WHEN p.project_type = 31 THEN '产品监督' ELSE NULL END AS projectTypeName, CASE WHEN p.project_type = 11 and p.category = 1 THEN '初始' WHEN p.project_type = 11 and p.category = 2 THEN '变更' WHEN p.project_type = 11 and p.category = 3 THEN '增项' WHEN p.project_type = 12 and p.category = 1 THEN '初始' WHEN p.project_type = 12 and p.category = 2 THEN '变更' WHEN p.project_type = 12 and p.category = 3 THEN '增项' WHEN p.project_type = 21 and p.category = 1 THEN '委托' WHEN p.project_type = 21 and p.category = 2 THEN '型式' WHEN p.project_type = 21 and p.category = 3 THEN '监督抽样' WHEN p.project_type = 31 THEN '' ELSE NULL END AS categoryName, CASE WHEN l.is_paid = 1 THEN '是' WHEN l.is_paid = 0 THEN '否' ELSE NULL END AS isPaid,
CASE WHEN l.pay_party = 1 THEN '客户' WHEN l.pay_party = 2 THEN '我方' ELSE NULL END AS payParty, CASE WHEN l.status = 1 THEN '进行中' WHEN l.status = 2 THEN '已完成' ELSE NULL END AS statusName FROM t_project_lab l LEFT JOIN t_project p ON l.project_id = p.id and p.deleted_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_third_party p3 ON l.third_party_id = p3.id LEFT JOIN t_customer c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_third_party p2 ON p.source_type = 1 AND p.source_id = p2.id LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON p.source_type = 2 AND p.source_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT pp.id AS product_id, pp.task_id, pm.mailing_date, pp.lab_report_date, pp.self_declaration_date, pp.certificate_send_date FROM t_project_product pp JOIN ( SELECT task_id, MAX(lab_report_date) AS max_lab_report_date FROM t_project_product GROUP BY task_id ) AS max_dates ON pp.task_id = max_dates.task_id AND pp.lab_report_date = max_dates.max_lab_report_date LEFT JOIN t_project_mail pm ON pp.mail_id = pm.id ) AS n on n.task_id = l.id WHERE p.project_type IN (11, 12, 21) AND l.third_party_id = #{queryForm.thirdPartyId} AND INSTR(p.project_no, #{queryForm.projectNo}) AND p.project_type = #{queryForm.projectType} AND p.category = #{queryForm.category} AND p.customer_id = #{queryForm.customerId} AND p.source_type = #{queryForm.sourceType} AND p.source_id = #{queryForm.sourceId}
AND l.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT n.task_id FROM t_project_node n WHERE operate_user_id = #{queryForm.operateUserId})
AND l.status = #{queryForm.status} AND INSTR(l.lab_contract_no, #{queryForm.labContractNo}) AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{queryForm.labPayDateBegin} AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{queryForm.labPayDateEnd} order by l.create_time

SELECT pp.*,l.task_no,l.third_party_id,l.lab_contract_no,l.lab_contract_date,l.lab_contract_amount,l.lab_expected_date,l.data_send_date,l.data_receive_date,l.is_paid,l.pay_party,l.lab_pay_date,l.assign_task_date, p.project_no, p.project_type, p.category, p.customer_id, p.source_type, p.source_id, p3.name AS thirdPartyName, c.customer_name AS customerName, CASE WHEN p.source_type = 1 THEN p2.name WHEN p.source_type = 2 THEN e.actual_name ELSE NULL END AS sourceName, DATEDIFF(l.lab_expected_date, CURDATE()) AS alarmDays FROM t_project_product pp JOIN t_project_lab l ON l.id = pp.task_id LEFT JOIN t_project p ON l.project_id = p.id and p.deleted_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_third_party p3 ON l.third_party_id = p3.id LEFT JOIN t_customer c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_third_party p2 ON p.source_type = 1 AND p.source_id = p2.id LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON p.source_type = 2 AND p.source_id = e.employee_id WHERE p.project_type IN (11, 12, 21) AND l.third_party_id IS NOT NULL AND l.third_party_id = #{queryForm.thirdPartyId} AND INSTR(p.project_no, #{queryForm.projectNo}) AND p.project_type = #{queryForm.projectType} AND p.category = #{queryForm.category} AND p.customer_id = #{queryForm.customerId} AND p.source_type = #{queryForm.sourceType} AND p.source_id = #{queryForm.sourceId}
AND l.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT n.task_id FROM t_project_node n WHERE operate_user_id = #{queryForm.operateUserId})
AND l.status = #{queryForm.status} AND INSTR(l.lab_contract_no, #{queryForm.labContractNo}) AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{queryForm.labPayDateBegin} AND DATE_FORMAT(l.lab_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{queryForm.labPayDateEnd}
AND pp.id in ( select distinct n.product_id from t_project_node n inner join ( select distinct project_id, task_id from t_project_node where project_type in (11,12,21) and node_id = 7 and status IN (2, 3)) as n1 on n1.project_id = n.project_id and n1.task_id = n.task_id where n.node_id = 8 and n.status in (0,1) )
AND pp.id in ( select distinct n.product_id from t_project_node n inner join ( select distinct project_id, task_id, product_id from t_project_node where project_type in (11,12,21) and node_id = 8 and status IN (2, 3)) as n1 on n1.project_id = n.project_id and n1.task_id = n.task_id and n1.product_id = n.product_id where n.node_id = 9 and n.status in (0,1) )
AND pp.id in ( select distinct n.product_id from t_project_node n inner join ( select distinct project_id, task_id, product_id from t_project_node where project_type in (11,12,21) and node_id = 9 and status IN (2, 3)) as n1 on n1.project_id = n.project_id and n1.task_id = n.task_id and n1.product_id = n.product_id where n.node_id = 10 and n.status in (0,1) )
order by l.create_time desc
